name: The Strange Hole
description:
3D game made by one person in one week. It is a explorative story game, realistic graphics and a interesting story.

Story

In a world in a strange hole three people were deployed in this world. James Miner,  Ema Peaters and  Gorge Home. In this mission they had to find more about this new world, but something happend. What happend to them? Find out in this game.
